segments.text: There's a question I'm not sure whether it is suitable to ask .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know that I have no secrets toward you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you go dinner with John , who foots the bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why asking that ? It's often the sort of Dutch treat .
segments.speaker: S2
